nickname.title: 1. Create your nickname
nickname.description: Come up with a nickname for 3-20 characters per line using latin characters and numbers.

name.title: 2. Enter your name
name.description: Come up with a name. Max name size 50 characters.

profile_description.title: 3. Enter your profile description
profile_description.description: Write some words about you self or skip this field.

email.title: 5. Enter your email
email.description: Please, enter valid email. We will sent a verification code on it.

password.title: 6. Create password
password.description: Create your password. Please use only words and digits. Minimum length is 8 symbols.

verification_code.title: 7. Enter the verification code
verification_code.description: You will receive a verification code by email, enter it in this field
